attributes.action: Proof of 10 Downing Street abiding by the Covid rules on 18th Dec 2020
attributes.additional_details: We should hold people accountable for their wrong doings. The same as every other normal person in this country. Why should these people be running our country and break our laws? People are suffering.
attributes.background: Show evidence that 10 Downing Street on the 18th of December 2020, was abiding by all regulations. They need to provide the public evidence that no party nor gathering happened on that day. Everyone was a friend as well as a colleague. It’s not just work that they were doing

rejection.details:
The Government has published terms of reference for an investigation by the Cabinet Secretary into allegations of gatherings that took place or may have taken place last year: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/terms-of-reference-for-the-cabinet-secretarys-investigations
 
The terms of reference for the above investigation state that if during the course of the work any evidence emerges of behaviour that is potentially a criminal offence, the matter will be referred to the police.
